title: Blended Language Learning Course for Enhancing Collective Cognitive Responsibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital learning tool application experience
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR-based blended learning conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Emphasizes summative assessments while strengthening collaborative learning competencies through knowledge-building activities during the process

learning_goals: Learners can perform collective cognitive accountability through knowledge and strategy evaluation processes within a language learning community
Learners can collaboratively advance language knowledge and learning strategies using simulation/VR tools in blended online-offline environments
Learners can measure and improve language learning outcomes based on self- and peer-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
